evidence.claim: M&M Wound Care handles health data in a HIPAA-compliant manner, indicating they may support specific standards for health data interchange.
M&M Wound Care employs electronic data interchange methods consistent with healthcare regulations, including X12 transaction sets.
The company provides services compatible with FHIR standards, emphasizing their focus on modern interoperability in healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction usage or API automation for healthcare data exchange.
